metadata.title: Projects
metadata.description: Gathan Mahesa is a freelance web developer, that specialize in interactive user interface, dynamic user experience, and motions

cover.headline:
A Step Into
Jakarta's Historic Timeline
cover.alt: A picture of The National Monument of Indonesia

description.paragraph: This project is a dedicated website to celebrate the 496th anniversary of Jakarta. Taking inspiration from the elegant design of canals-amsterdam.com, a website dedicated to Amsterdam's canals history, I was immediately astonished and thought, "This design is truly amazing, how about I make my own about Jakarta?." Motivated by this inspiration, I tried to recreate a similar aesthetic for the Jakarta history website, striving to capture the essence of both cities while delivering an engaging user experience.
